item.title: Heather add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "When it is dark enough, you can see the stars." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Heather add a quote by Judith Campbell
item.description: "When your heart speaks, take good notes." -- Judith Campbell

item.title: Heather add a quote by Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
item.description: "There is a candle in your heart, ready to be kindled. There is a void in your soul, ready to be filled. You feel it, don't you?" -- Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi

item.title: Heather add a quote by Greg Mortenson
item.description: "Trust in Allah, but tie up your camel.' Sign in Skardu" -- Greg Mortenson

item.title: Heather add a quote by Saint Teresa of Avila
item.description: "Let nothing perturb you, nothing frighten you. All things pass. God does not change. Patience achieves everything." -- Saint Teresa of Avila

item.title: Heather add a quote by Rabindranath Tagore
item.description: "Not hammer-strokes, but dance of the water, sings the pebbles into perfection." -- Rabindranath Tagore

item.title: Heather add a quote by John Green
item.description: "Books are the ultimate Dumpees: put them down and theyâ€™ll wait for you forever; pay attention to them and they always love you back." -- John Green

item.title: Heather add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Finish each day and be done with it. You have done what you could. Some blunders and absurdities no doubt crept in; forget them as soon as you can. Tomorrow is a new day. You shall begin it serenely and with too high a spirit to be encumbered with your old nonsense." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson
